#summary How to control SayMyName using Locale

= Introduction =

Since SayMyName 2.2 a [http://www.twofortyfouram.com/ Locale]-Plugin is available. It allows you to set the volume of SayMyName dependent on your location, the time, contacts, ...


= Details =

To control SayMyName, go to a situation in Locale add a setting.

You can change volume, "respect silent" and how often to repeat the caller.

If you want SayMyName to go silent in this situation, set speakvolume to 0.
